column4: I don't think I've ever felt like such an idiot. Um... I've never used Linux before, and I'm downloading it right now, so I was wondering if I could get some help swapping from Windows XP.
I've downloaded it before but when I did with 7.04 I believe I used the wrong .iso and the wrong kind of disk.
I was kind of hoping someone could tell me what kind of CD I should be using.
it depends on the architecture of your machine
